Module BayesianClassifier
Package dataStructures

Class UndirFullGraph

java.lang.Object
dataStructures.Graph
dataStructures.UndirFullGraph
public class UndirFullGraph
extends Graph
This class represents a Undirected Fully connected graph which is a sub-type of graph data structure
Author:
Group 20
